lead_paragraph: Two years ago, Buzz Bissinger took a stand against digital culture, David Carr writes in his latest column in The New York Times.
snippet: After a savage televised rant against blogs two years ago, Buzz Bissinger today is a habitual Twitter user.

headline.main: Carr: The Zeal of a Convert to Twitter

abstract: After a savage televised rant against blogs two years ago, Buzz Bissinger today is a habitual Twitter user.
